shows.title: No Tail to Tell
shows.plot_overview: Eun-ho, a free-spirited gumiho, avoids good deeds and romance to steer clear of becoming human. Her carefree life takes an unexpected turn after a fateful encounter with a self-absorbed soccer star.

shows.title: The 'Burbs
shows.plot_overview: Set in present-day suburbia, a young couple returns to the husband's childhood home. Their world is upended when new neighbors move in next door, bringing old secrets of the cul-de-sac to light, and new deadly threats shatter the illusion of their quiet little neighborhood.

shows.title: Murdaugh: Death in the Family
shows.plot_overview: Maggie and Alex enjoy a lavish life of privilege as members of one of South Carolina's most powerful legal dynasties. But when their son Paul is involved in a deadly boat crash, the family is faced with a test unlike any they've ever encountered. As details come to light and new challenges emerge, the family's connections to several mysterious deaths raise questions which threaten everything Maggie and Alex hold dear.

shows.title: The Company
shows.plot_overview: A future-era antique shop owner, Bi Zhi, joins forces with modern veterinarian Su Beilu on a time-traveling quest to recover lost antiques. As they journey through different eras, they encounter unique cultures and life stories, building an unexpected friendship that inspires them to approach their own lives with renewed optimism.
